Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light brown-red slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, identifying the contents.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393747) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393747)
